testcase.name: End to end test for creating, retriving and deleting
testcase.system-out: Given User add place payload with "Dream House" "91763548542" "142-20 Homeland".passed When User calls "ADDPLACEAPI" with "POST" http request......................passed Then User verify in response body place_id is created.......................passed And The API call is success with status code 200............................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed And "scope" in response body is "APP".......................................passed And User verify place_id created maps to "Dream House" using "GETPLACEAPI" with "GET" http request.passed

testcase.name: Verify if Delete Place functionality is working
testcase.system-out: Given User added DeletePlace Payload........................................passed When User calls "DELETEPLACEAPI" with "POST" http request...................passed Then The API call is success with status code 200...........................passed And "status" in response body is "OK".......................................passed
